trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref> to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref>和其他類型。

trans-unit.source: `ResourceReferenceExpression` is an internal class, so your code cannot obtain instances of the class to convert.
trans-unit.target: `ResourceReferenceExpression`是內部的類別，因此您的程式碼無法取得類別進行轉換的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ResourceReferenceExpressionConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ResourceReferenceExpressionConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the converter can convert from a source object to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出轉換子是否可以從來源物件轉換<xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The type to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果轉換子可以執行轉換，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the converter can convert a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref> object to the specified destination type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出轉換是否將<xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref>指定的目的地類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The type to convert to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果轉換子可以執行轉換，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: destinationType is .
Converts the specified value to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值，轉換<xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref>型別。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
The converted value.
Converts the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref> object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的轉換<xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceReferenceExpression" name="ResourceReferenceExpression" href=""></xref>用於指定類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
The type to convert to.
The converted value.
destinationType is .
value must be of type .
